page.title: 07POLITICS IN SALTCOATS
page.content: {LOCAL GOVERNMENT {Cunninghame District}is responsible for the provision of housing, cleansing, leisure and a variety of economic and industrial affairs. Of the{30}councillors,{7}represent this area. Cunninghame District is part of {STRATHCLYDE Region. The political system which operates within Local Government in the area has resulted in both authorities being controlled by elected representatives of the Labour Party. {NATIONAL GOVERNMENT The area falls into the constituencies of 2 M.P.'S -{David Lambie (Labour) and{John Corrie (Conservative).
